Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: We sat in the hidden garden in the back on a cloudy Tuesday night. Totopos was a little by spicy and delicious. Salsa vas good guac was great. Cocktails are different and delicious

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Casa del Toro has one of the best vibes of any restaursnt I’ve been to in the city— the bar has a giant guitar on the ceiling and the garden area is super cute. They were super accommodating to customize my veggie quesadilla with the …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Absolutely a huge scam with their Margarita Pitcher! and waiters don't wear masks! …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great restaurant with amazing vibes! Food was delicious with variety of apps and tacos to choose from. The service was excellent, and the live aerial performance was nice surprise! The spot has both comfortable indoor and outdoor seating (front and back garden) to suit preference too.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Best margaritas. And their homemade salsa and chips rocks. Highly recommend. The staff was very friendly.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Order chips& guac and two tacos. The chips are well seasoned and crunchy, which we enjoyed a lot. However, the tacos were off. The pescado taco was salty but blend otherwise, and the portobello taco was saggy. The service was nice.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Fresh and delicious food and drinks. Happy hour is from 5-7 with half price cocktails. Cocktails are creative and made by an experienced mixologist. …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Casa sel Toro is my go to Mexican restaurant! The tacos are delicious as well as the quesadilla. Every time I go here, the vibe is fresh and lively and the margaritas are cold. I highly recommend trying the matadors wife as well! Thank you for the amazing and attentive service. Will be returning again soon!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Fancy gem garden for New York City, covered and strongly heated, one of my best outdoor dining experience so far during this Covid era! Tasty carne asada and great margaritas! highly recommended!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text:
Go for the appetizers. Steer clear of the tacos.

Also, cocktails were 100% on point. The place is better for tapas and drinks …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Wow! The aerialist show was unbelievable!!!! I had a blast with my friends that night and even got on the Toro to take pictures 👌 The tacos, croqueras, elote (fresh corn with a wonderful sauce) as well as the fish quesadillas were out of …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Casa del Toro has a wonderful menu filled with awesome choices of food and cocktails!! Not only were the options on the menu amazing, but the service was incredible as well. We will definitely be back and are looking forward to more visits to the restaurant :)

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: There was a $50 minimum per person, which is a lot when a small menu is made up of tapas style dishes. We struggled to reach the $50/person. Food was ok, I definitely have had better food. There was a performer which is a girl doing …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Nice atmosphere and very friendly staff! Loved the ambiance, it was such a perfect night to celebrate my birthday 🎉, fancy cocktail by mixologist, great food, I definitely recommend to share the 9 tacos on the menus! Tasty corn shell for …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Love it! Been there a couple of times already and love the concept and atmosphere. Great staff and interesting signature cocktails! Tale of the toro or Matador’s wife are delicious. It’s a busy place on the weekends and the aerialist show …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: The best part of this place is the fun, laid back atmosphere. Our server was so great at keeping up an uplifting mood, it was contagious. After such a rough year for the city this places reminds me of how alive and fun NYC usually feels …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Highly recommend!  We ate in their back garden, and the food was lovely.  Great taco's, and margaritas.  Staff were friendly (free tequila shots), ambiance was great even though we were the only ones there (COVID times).  It's in the running to become our new neighborhood haunt!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Liked the cocktails, spicy chips, guacamole & salsa, tacos, got free shots too! Amazing drinks & foods!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great food and a fun atmosphere!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Pretty disappointed in the experience as a whole. If you’re going just to see the aerialist shows at 7:45, be prepared for the fact that the show is about 6 minutes long and every hour or hour and a half. The aerialist is wonderful but the …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text:
Sangria was good so as the guac and chips.
Keep it mind that this is not a casual & nice priced place.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Went there for their grand opening and loved it! Food, drinks and atmosphere were amazing. I especially loved the shrimp tacos! The chips they use for their guacamole have a perfect spice to them and need a shout out, as well! We ordered a …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: My portobello taco was very bad. Like horrible and I was waiting a lot for a beer. Definitely in not going to go here again anymore

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Tasty elevated Mexican restaurant. For an app, we got the tostada, which was smaller than we expected. For entrees, we got the chicken fajitas and short rib quesadilla, which were delicious. The drinks were also good, although a little pricey for a margarita.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: From the moment I walked in to the moment I left 4 hrs later, they took excellent care of me and my guests. Delicious and succulent food,  wonderful service and great setting for a mesmerized Saturday's brunch

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Very impressive place, stylish and the oversized bull is pretty cool, large selection of Tacos and interesting Smokey cocktails! Tales of Toro is a must (smoky tequila old fashion style) staff is above amazing and the large heated garden such a hidden gem!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: I would like to give them four stars for now but may change it when I visit it again when the A/C is fixed and the employees wear a mask. 😑 …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Absolutely love this place ! The food is amazing and it isn't your typical Mexican restaurant menu, which brings about a unique dining experience, shying away from the mundane. Just try the chorizo fundido and you will see exactly what I am …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: I was finally able to go to Casa Del Toro for outdoor dining after the quarantine, the garden is spacious with nice warm colors, I was also really impressed by the flavors and quality of their food, from the guacamole to the Tacos and also …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: This place is interesting. It's an impressive space, the setup and ambiance is gorgeous, with some great music playing. The staff is super friendly and attentive. …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Been here twice in a week because it is so delicious! Got the chips and guac, the taquitos, and have tried basically every taco. So so good. Also love the sangria. Get the carnitas or the Al Pastor taco no matter what! Juicy and delicious. Great service and cute ambience as well.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text:
BEST PLACE FOR A LARGE BIRTHDAY CELEBRATION!!!

I heard about the place through a friend of mine that happened to eat there and …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: A lovely evening of quality Mexican food and very high quality drinks. Our server Fabrice was warm and welcoming. We will definitely be coming back and thank you for being especially accommodating for our Chihuahua Sadie.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: I have never been to this place before and but it turned out great! The good was good, the music was good the Ariel dancing was good. It was just an overall good vibe.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: The food and service was great! We were a party of 8 so I know that is difficult to deal with and given COVID times, that much more difficult. We appreciate being accommodated outside and table adjusted to be further distanced from other …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text:
Food was incredible, prices were reasonable (Toto are we in Manhattan anymore?), service was great and the garden patio was a lovely escape from the rush of sidewalk eating. Will be coming AGAIN and AGAIN.
Oh and they allow dogs :) and immediately bring them water bowls

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: I went there Last weekend for Halloween Dia Del Los Muertos event,  cocktails were amazing and I also recommend the tequila flight tastings, I tried the Grand Patron and my friend Siete Léguas. Staff were all dressed up for the occasion which was nice to find a place with great ambiance and festive style- specially nowadays!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text:
Modern Mexican fare. Tacos served by the piece, so easy to mix and match.
Very accommodating and friendly. Be prepared for a 10 minute wait, but you’ll be offered to order drink while waiting.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: I was there for the grand opening. Just great ! The service is really good, amazing cocktails, performers (yes we had a contortionist on the bar) and food. I had the Tlayuda and shrimp tacos .... very tasty ! A great new spot in the neighborhood.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great tacos and service. Austyn was fantastic! Will be back for sure.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Very friendly service. Unfortunately predatory pricing is not a good thing in the current environment. If your waiter suggests a pitcher - suggest you ask the price. $75 is plain ridiculous for a Basic margarita pitcher.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Fairly new in the neighborhood (as of 10/2020) but we've been there 4 times already. Limited menu but everything is very good and priced right. Very friendly service. And they have a very nice heated garden in the back

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: This is an example of a chef going to Mexico once and thinking he can make their food. It was sad and expensive. First taco left unfinished in my life maybe. Service is good. That's it. Don't drop $5 on these bland tacos.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Very good tacos and drinks! Definitely coming back!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Excellent atmosphere for dining in the age of covid. Their outdoor courtyard in the back of the restaurant makes you feel like you're actually eating inside of a restaurant. Much nicer feel than being on the sidewalk or in the street.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Hade a great experience after a funeral the food and drinks where excellent and waiters where kind and caring thru our time of grieving

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: PSA: Unacceptably poor fajitas. Do not order if you want to have a fajita. No rice, beans, or cheese. You get 1 giant tortilla on the side. This is a burrito that hasn't been rolled.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great staff and good music! Good food kinda pricey but yummy

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Delicious food/drinks, great service, and cute vibe - love the patio. Drinks are typical Manhattan prices, but food is very reasonable especially in Manhattan!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: The Tacos were so good, this is one of the best places I have eaten at in a long time! The staff were so great and I can't wait to come back!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Good tacos, but service was subpar. We were seated in a very dark part of the dining room and had to use our phone flashlights to view the menu. It was like being being part of a search n rescue.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: I went there during my holidays, during Halloween, as per my friend’s recommandation. We spend very good time. It is very friendly and good food!! It is important for me, I am French 😄. Thank you to the team!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great addition to the neighborhood.  5 quality tacos for $20.  Mix and match.  Good service.  Nice vibe.  Looking to come back as the refine .

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: So happy to welcome this place to the neighborhood. Wonderful place for a date night, wonderful place to grab a cocktail and the food was delicious. Finally a cute spot to grab food and drinks in the neighborhood with an amazing vibe. Can't wait to go back.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Tacos are amazing (especially on tuesdays when they're 3$) and the cocktails are very creative. Definitely recommend the Matador's wife cocktail.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great tacos! Everything on the menu is great. The open backyard is perfect for outdoor dining

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Best tacos I've ever had

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Amazing restaurant! Incredible show and very good food! I will definitely will be back!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Good place to hangout. Food is average. Very good customer service. Limited options

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Always excited to see a new restaurant in the neighborhood. Can't wait to see what they have to offer.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great meal, and it came with a bottle of wine, making it a great deal. Everything was well packaged.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great tacos, and I loved the backyard garden for outdoor seating!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: I thought the food was delicious. There was also a fun atmosphere and the cocktails were great!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Food and service were great!!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: The owner Sanjay owes me money.  never come back again.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great service. Food was only okay

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Love this place  took girl and we has a great time

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great place with really good food.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great restaurant and food!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Great place 👌

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Bomb tacos.

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Love the vibe and the service here! If you like spicy cocktails get the Matador’s Mistress - mezcal, pineapple juice, ginger, agave, lime and pink pepper. Food is great too - the guacamole is fresh and everything is full of flavor. Highly recommend!

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: Hot damn this is the spot! We were in the hood and craving some yummy Mexican - Casa del Toro did not disappoint. From the funky eclectic styling (there’s a guitar on the ceiling above the bar!) to the “just right size” tacos and excellent …

Name: Casa del Toro
Review Text: The staff was super friendly and courteous. The restaurant was very clean. The bathroom was spot clean and well maintained. My only downside was the food temperature. When I got my tacos, they were barely warm so by the time I got to my …
